name: Put in
description:
Hot summer days have come. So it’s time to go for a walk on a beach and maybe find some hotties in there. And play some naughty puzzle game with them.
Rotate the puzzle pieces to complete it. But you should be fast! Time is running out, and to find girls you should make your way past this tiny little hole.
It will be an unforgettable summer journey! Are you ready for it?

Featues:
Logic puzzle for adult audience!
Handwritten graphics and unusual level design!
Classic gameplay with erotic style.
Simple control.
Rotate puzzle pieces to complete it. And try to do it on 3-stars!
30 levels with hot girls.
Many achievements.
